mapper.select: select A.name as name, C.category_name as category_name, P.program_name, P.status, P.start_date, P.end_date FROM swap.Program as P LEFT JOIN swap.Category as C ON P.category_id = C.id LEFT JOIN swap.Admin as A ON P.admin_id = A.id order by P.regdate desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Program (admin_id, category_id, application_form, program_name, information, start_date, end_date,quota) VALUES (#{admin_id}, #{category_id}, #{application_form}, #{program_name}, #{information}, #{start_date}, #{end_date},#{quota})
